bibl.title: Frankincense in the 'Triangular' Indo-Arabian-Roman Aromatics Trade.
bibl.note: The increase in the South Arabian frankincense exports to the Roman world and the problem of reciprocal supplies for the Romans.

bibl.title: Food for the Gods. New Light on the Ancient Incense Trade

bibl.seg: GUPTA Sunil, Frankincense in the 'Triangular' Indo-Arabian-Roman Aromatics Trade.
David PEACOCK and David WILLIAMS (Edd.), Food for the Gods. New Light on the Ancient Incense Trade (Oxford, 2007) pp. 112-121, 2 profils, 5 figg., 1 carte.
The increase in the South Arabian frankincense exports to the Roman world and the problem of reciprocal supplies for the Romans.
